ai_sprite.name: guard
ai_sprite.dialog: This city was named after the same Gideon that Nehor murdered. Such a terrible loss.

ai_sprite.name: guard
ai_sprite.dialog: Our judge in Gideon is rarely in the judgment seat. He keeps busy helping the people.

ai_sprite.name: guard
ai_sprite.dialog: Heh heh, sometimes I sit in the judgment seat when nobody is looking.

ai_sprite.name: guard
ai_sprite.dialog: Sometimes the Lamanites have attacked us from the east and the north, so we have increased our defenses near this city.
